title: Ep. 36 - Stop Telling People To Stop Judging
description:
We are often told that it is wrong to "judge." It is even said that the Bible warns against "judging." Both of these claims are false. We should judge. It is good to judge. As long as we judge rightly.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
